channel.title: Comments on: Ben Stever moving on!

item.title: By: Anneliese Taylor
item.dc:creator: Anneliese Taylor
item.description: Aw, shucks. I'm sorry to see you go. But I wish you all the best with your move and starting up your life in Portland.
item.content:encoded: Aw, shucks. I’m sorry to see you go. But I wish you all the best with your move and starting up your life in Portland.

item.title: By: Dylan Romero
item.dc:creator: Dylan Romero
item.description: It has been on honor to work with you Ben and your sense of humor and expertise will definitely be missed! Stay in touch and best of luck with your next adventure!!!
item.content:encoded: It has been on honor to work with you Ben and your sense of humor and expertise will definitely be missed! Stay in touch and best of luck with your next adventure!!!

item.title: By: Lisa Leiva
item.dc:creator: Lisa Leiva
item.description: Ben, Thank you so much for all your help getting started with LTG! I am sad to see you go but super excited for your new adventures!
item.content:encoded: Ben, Thank you so much for all your help getting started with LTG! I am sad to see you go but super excited for your new adventures!

item.title: By: Mary Tahir
item.dc:creator: Mary Tahir
item.description: Noooo! I will miss you. Thanks for all your help and best of luck with your new adventures.
item.content:encoded: Noooo! I will miss you. Thanks for all your help and best of luck with your new adventures.

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description:
Say it ain't so! :-((((
Best of luck on the next chapter!
item.content:encoded:
Say it ain’t so! :-((((

Best of luck on the next chapter!

item.title: By: Richard Trott
item.dc:creator: Richard Trott
item.description: This is a big loss for the Library and the campus, but hooray for new adventures! Best wishes, Ben!
item.content:encoded: This is a big loss for the Library and the campus, but hooray for new adventures! Best wishes, Ben!

item.title: By: Min-Lin Fang
item.dc:creator: Min-Lin Fang
item.description: hi Ben you can't leave :< Thank you so much for your excellent tech support as always. Best of luck to you and Emily in the new chapter of your life!!!
item.content:encoded: hi Ben you can’t leave :< Thank you so much for your excellent tech support as always. Best of luck to you and Emily in the new chapter of your life!!!

item.title: By: Sean Mcclelland
item.dc:creator: Sean Mcclelland
item.description: Ben, this is how I feel about you leaving: https://youtu.be/WWaLxFIVX1s
item.content:encoded: Ben, this is how I feel about you leaving: https://youtu.be/WWaLxFIVX1s

item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: Ben, you will be missed, but it sounds like you have adventures ahead. Good luck with the move!
item.content:encoded: Ben, you will be missed, but it sounds like you have adventures ahead. Good luck with the move!
